tool_description: Organizes and manages photographic evidence of violations, compliance issues, and facility conditions with proper documentation and metadata.

image_paths.description: File paths or URLs of inspection photos

photo_locations.description: Locations where each photo was taken

photo_timestamps.description: Timestamps when photos were captured (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: image_paths, photo_locations, and photo_timestamps must have equal lengths.
Invalid image paths: One or more image files cannot be accessed or do not exist.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Empty photo data: Provide at least one photo with complete metadata.
usage: Provide image_paths, photo_locations, and photo_timestamps arrays of equal length. The tool organizes photos with metadata and returns structured evidence documentation.

total_photos_processed.description: Total number of photos successfully processed

evidence_categories.description: Categories of evidence documented in photos

photo_manifest.description: Organized list of photos with reference identifiers

documentation_complete.description: Whether all required photo documentation is complete
